fields.name: asin
fields.label: ASIN
fields.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number (auto-extracted from URL if blank)

fields.name: coverImage
fields.label: Custom Cover Image URL
fields.description: Leave empty to use Open Library cover. Set a URL to override.

fields.name: relatedBooks
fields.label: Related Books
fields.description: Slugs of related books (e.g. deep-work, atomic-habits)

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
